overview: James St. Jean has worked in the CRM sector for the past 15 years at a variety of startups and public software companies. During that time, he built and delivered enterprise applications to some of largest consumer companies in the world. Jim was previously a senior executive at Chordiant Software Inc., a public CRM company, where he worked for 8 years in a variety of roles including Chief Technology Officer and VP, Worldwide Engineering. In addition to founding or co-founding 2 prior software start-ups, Jim was also VP and Chief Architect for the Vantive Corporation, a leading CRM company that was acquired by PeopleSoft in 1997. When not building companies or spending time with family, Jim can be found climbing and mountain biking.
